mean_cn: adj. 已受委派而尚未上任的；  vt. 标出，委任，任命，提名
mean_en: to officially choose (someone or something) to do or be something :to officially give (someone or something) a particular role or purpose
word_etyma: de着重 + sign记号，信号 + ate动词后缀 → designate 指定
short_phrase: designate him as the new C.E.O.
sentence: Xiaoming is designated as our new class monitor.
sentence_trans: 小明被委任成为了我们班的新班长。
